colorOfMessageDesc.message: Color that will stand out on the page found by word or phrase. For example: red, # 336699

delayOfMessageDesc.message: The delay (in seconds) display pop-up message that will appear in the match page

extActiveYesNoDesc.message: Global parameter which is responsible for the expansion in general. If 'not active' search for pages withheld. If 'active' (default value) page analysis performed in accordance with the specified keywords

extDescription.message: Automatic search, selection and notification by keywords on the page

extName.message: Auto lights chosen words on a page

voiceMessageDesc.message: Voice announcement which will be heard in the match on the page. Supported only english language

voiceMessageYesNoDesc.message: Will heard a voice notification if a hit on a page?

wordListDesc.message: A list of words or phrases, separated by commas, in which to search for the page
